title: LG launches new gram laptops with Intel Alder Lake processors in Korea
content:
LG is refreshing its ultra-light gram laptops with 12th-generation Intel processors and optional discrete graphics, the company has announced. The 2022 LG gram lineup includes 14-, 15-, 16- and 17-inch sizes, but the focus is on the two larger models. The LG gram 16 and 17 will be available with an Intel Core i5-1240P or

The post LG launches new gram laptops with Intel Alder Lake processors in Korea appeared first on xda-developers.
description: LG has announced the 2022 refresh of its gram laptops, featuring 12th-generation P-series processors and optional discrete graphics.
